name: Interior Design Kit - Floor plans made easy!
description:
Enjoy designing your new floor plan or (re)furnishing your home with this extensive interior design kit 🏡.


You can use the furniture standard dimensions or scale each furniture to your required size. 🪑🛋🚪🛁🛏


1 cm is mapped to 1 px.



--------------------

New in Version 2.0

Plenty of new objects 🥳 including various types of stairs, kitchen items (sink, cooking top, fridge, etc.) and vehicles (cars, bikes, baby stroller). Moreover a short How-To for Figma newbies.
